item.title: K3s cluster architecture
item.description: High level cluster architecture This post will describe the k3s-cluster architecture, what components I will use and which steps I have to take before I can get ArgoCD up and running for Gitops. The goal is to do as few manual steps as possible until ArgoCD is installed and everything can be moved to git and a gitops approach. To be able to setup and access ArgoCD I need persistent storage.

item.title: Welcome
item.description: Hello and welcome to my blog. In this blog I will document what I do when I have some time to spare trying out different open source software. Last year I built my own server from used parts which I purchased on ebay. It’s a dual cpu motherboard with two intel Xeon e5 2680 v4 each with 14 cores and 28 threads, 512 GB DDR4 ECC ram and 2 TB SSD disk, running VmWare ESXI for virtualization.
About Me Afshin Yavari is a freelance infrastructure architect, DevOps- and software Engineer.
